proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params.permissions: the permissions to remove from the role
params.roleId: the roleId to remove the permission from

params.channelId: the channelId to remove the role from
params.entitlement: the address of the entitlement that we are removing the role from
params.roleId: the roleId to remove from the channel

params.entitlement: the address of the entitlement to remove
params.roleId: the roleId to remove the entitlement from

params.channelId: the channelId to set the access for
params.disabled: whether to make the channel disabled or not

params.entitlementModule: the address of the new entitlement
params.whitelist: whether to set the entitlement as activated or not

params.roleId: the roleId to be set as the owner role id

params.disabled: whether to make the space disabled or not

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

params.channelName: the new name of the channel

params.roleName: the new name of the role

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

__gap.details: Added to allow future versions to add new variables in case this contract becomes      inherited. See https://docs.openzeppelin.com/contracts/4.x/upgradeable#storage_gaps

addPermissionsToRole(uint256,string[]).notice: ***** Permission Management *****adds a permission to a role by roleId

addRoleToChannel(string,address,uint256).notice: adds a role to a channel

addRoleToEntitlement(uint256,(address,by.notice: adds a role to an entitlement

createChannel(string,string,uint256[]).notice: creates a new channel for the space

createRole(string,string[],(address,byte.notice: creates a new role for the space

getChannelByHash(bytes32).notice: fetches the Channel information by the hashed channelId

getChannelInfo(string).notice: fetches the Channel information by the channelId

getChannels().notice: fetches all the channels for the space

getEntitlementByModuleType(string).notice: gets an entitlement address by its module type

getEntitlementIdsByRoleId(uint256).notice: ***** Entitlement Management *****gets the entitlements for a given role

getEntitlementModules().notice: fetches all the entitlements for the space

getPermissionsByRoleId(uint256).notice: fetches the permissions for a role by roleId

getRoleById(uint256).notice: fetches the role information by roleId

getRoles().notice: ***** Role Management *****fetches the all the created roles for the space

isEntitledToChannel(string,address,strin.notice: checks if a user is entitled to a permission in a channel

isEntitledToSpace(address,string).notice: checks if a user is entitled to a permission in the space

removePermissionsFromRole(uint256,string.notice: removes a permission from a role by roleId

removeRoleFromChannel(string,address,uin.notice: removes a role from a channel

removeRoleFromEntitlement(uint256,(addre.notice: removes an entitlement from the space

setChannelAccess(string,bool).notice: sets whether the channel is disabled or not

setEntitlementModule(address,bool).notice: sets a new entitlement module for the space

setOwnerRoleId(uint256).notice: sets a created roleId to be the owner role id for the Space

setSpaceAccess(bool).notice: sets whether the space is disabled or not

updateRole(uint256,string).notice: updates a role name by roleId
